event.eventText: Jamie and Rachel invent a time machine as a wedding gift to Sean.
Sean was born. This day will come to be known around the world as one of the most important dates of the modern world.
Sean turns one. Your mum notices you are not like all the other children at baby groups, she can't quite put her finger on why though.
You are 2 Sean. At this point you managed to type your first computer program...10 goto 20, 20 print "hello".
You start to really appreciate your birthday presents, especially the ones with batteries in.
This is the turning point in your life. You know what you want from your future. You just need to get a bit older...
Starting school. This is a very scary month.
Lyndsay is beginning to stand out in your life as someone who actually understands you and appreciates what makes you tick.
Seans wins an award for collaboration.
Jamie And Sean go bowling, after which jamie takes an impromptu trip to buy new trousers.
Rachel helps Sean out with a particularly tedious issue.... should he make a toast to the bridesmaids in his speech or is that the best mans job?
Congratulations!! The most amazing day of your life. You marry your childhood sweetheart in front of hundreds of tearful onlookers (who the heck invited all of them...Abu...Facebook?)
Still exhausted from married life you accidently say something you shouldn't to HR team.
Visit Graz with her new baby. Apparently she has given it the middle name Sean in the hope it may turn out as helpful as you.
You get so fed up with one of the testers you shut them in a cupboard over the weekend and play loud rock music so their screams cannot be heard.
Stuart comes to visit you as he misses your bro-mance so badly. He is wearing a dress and you find that a bit awkward...
This month sees you buying chocolate for everyone you know as a token of appreciation.
During a team meeting, a loud and suspiciously smelly noise erupts from Sean's location. No one mentions it though.
During his summer break, Sean develops a rash on his forearm, possibly related to the new device Tosin has been developing.
During an xbox session with Jamie, Sean confesses his secret crush on a former senior management work colleague.
Seans slips on ice and strains his right wrist, jokes follow.
Rachel Turns "21"
Jamie Turns 25, Sean gives him lots of money to celebrate.
Novacroft members put out a petition to stop Abus Advertising efforts.
A new Software Delivery Manager starts work.
The new Software Delivery Manager resigns, he can't take the pace.
Sean turns 26, Daryl sends him to ITSO for the day to celebrate.
Destiny 2 comes out, turns out its the exact same game but with lv 35 as the max.
Peak hits at Novacroft. Graz escapes on maternity leave (again).
Sean held another R&D collaboration session, as usual, I.T. wasn't happy about it.
Rachel spent the month complaining about her heating.
Christmas arrives, Rachel puts on her pantomime with Sean playing the role of Hazel.
You decide this year you will finally admit you have googled everything so far.
You find a whole patch of grey hairs. You talk to Tosin to see if he can help.
ITSO bring out a new specification, with really detailed documentation.
There is a maypole dance at work
The guttering falls off your house. You put it up for sale.
Summer holiday in kazakstan.
Lyndsay is starting to look very round???
Jamie, Sean and Daryl decide to walk the Great Wall of China.
Sean trys kayaking and gets very cold. He has to take the whole month off.
Lyndsay and Sean are delighted to announce the safe delivery of their quads, 6 weeks early but all healthy and well.
Sean brings the quads into work to give Lyndsay a break.
A massive sink hole appears in the car park.
During the fire drill Gavin (the new recruit) passes out.
Workmen accidently spill orange paint all over the carpets in your house Sean.
You spend a terrified 2 hours searching for one of your children after they crawl off in different directions at the park.
Cigar rolling becomes your new challenging hobby.
You host a BBQ but forget the charcoal.
You announce that Lyndsay is expecting again...
Your parents move to the Himalayas after a great walking holiday there.
The government decide to merge Corby and Kettering.
Fantasy dress up day at work. You wear your star trek t-shirt.
Sean takes up a new hobby - flower arranging. Using his new skills he makes a bouquet for Abu's wife when she safely delivers twins.
Tea at Buckingham Palace!
You buy a minibus to transport all the children around in.
Anthony moves next door to you
Jez borrows the minibus so he can take the band on tour (he is now a full time singer), his band is called "The Doggers".
The school phone. Roderick has fallen and bumped his head.
Your fridge is covered with amazing artwork.....
You move away from Kettering to your new house in Loddington.
Tosin invents a device to gather womens phone numbers.
Rachel eats lots of chocolate.
A long lost relative invites himself to stay for a while...
Still trying to persuade the relative to move out.
Still trying to persuade the relative to move out... you even offered to drive them.
Long lost relative is still barricaded in your house
Double Dan persuades long lost relative to move out
A new coding language is "created" called mumbo jumbo
databases are announced as obsolete, the cloud is one massive storage area with such an amazing algorithym databases are surplus to requirements.
Mike Hill invents a new food replicator.
Sean goes to Daryl's retirement party and shows off his new moves on the dance floor.
Earwigs are pronounced extinct. A world holiday is announced.
Your trousers seem to be longer? May be you are shrinking?
Dogs are genetically engineered without bottom holes to avoid the need to clean up after them.
Rachel writes a new novel called 50 shades of 21.
Teabag flicking is accepted as an olympic sport
A horse called Jammie Dodger wins the Grand National
Prince Harry marries his cleaner.
Jamie and Sean enjoy another game of Destiny on their yBox 9.
Whilst laughing at his great grandaughters joke, Sean chokes on his false teeth and stops breathing. RIP.

events.randomEvent: Bit of a boring month really...
Not a lot going on here...
A lot of smiling happens this month...
This month passes by so fast...
